explains: adv. 反常地；变态地；不规则地

sentences.en: She suggests that women are under constant pressure to be abnormally thin.
sentences.cn: 她提出女性受持续的压力之下要异常苗条。

sentences.en: The bear behaved abnormally, probably because of hunger.
sentences.cn: 这只熊的行为异常，可能是因为饥饿吧。

sentences.en: El Ninos are associated with abnormally dry conditions in Southern Asia and Australia.
sentences.cn: 厄尔尼诺现象与南亚和澳大利亚反常的干旱状况有关。
